30namespace webrtc {
31
32const int kMinFrameRateFps = 2;
33
34namespace {
35
36// For frame rate, the steps we take are 2/3 (down) and 3/2 (up).
37int GetLowerFrameRateThan(int fps) {
38 RTC_DCHECK(fps != std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
39 return (fps * 2) / 3;
40}
41// TODO(hbos): Use absl::optional<> instead?
42int GetHigherFrameRateThan(int fps) {
43 return fps != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
44 ? (fps * 3) / 2
45 : std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
46}
47
48int GetIncreasedMaxPixelsWanted(int target_pixels) {
49 if (target_pixels == std::numeric_limits<int>::max())
50 return std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
51 // When we decrease resolution, we go down to at most 3/5 of current pixels.
52 // Thus to increase resolution, we need 3/5 to get back to where we started.
53 // When going up, the desired max_pixels_per_frame() has to be significantly
54 // higher than the target because the source's native resolutions might not
55 // match the target. We pick 12/5 of the target.
56 //
57 // (This value was historically 4 times the old target, which is (3/5)*4 of
58 // the new target - or 12/5 - assuming the target is adjusted according to
59 // the above steps.)
60 RTC_DCHECK(target_pixels != std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
61 return (target_pixels * 12) / 5;
62}
63
64bool CanDecreaseResolutionTo(int target_pixels,
65 int target_pixels_min,
66 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
67 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions) {
68 int max_pixels_per_frame =
69 rtc::dchecked_cast<int>(restrictions.max_pixels_per_frame().value_or(
70 std::numeric_limits<int>::max()));
71 return target_pixels < max_pixels_per_frame &&
72 target_pixels_min >= input_state.min_pixels_per_frame();
73}
74
75bool CanIncreaseResolutionTo(int target_pixels,
76 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions) {
77 int max_pixels_wanted = GetIncreasedMaxPixelsWanted(target_pixels);
78 int max_pixels_per_frame =
79 rtc::dchecked_cast<int>(restrictions.max_pixels_per_frame().value_or(
80 std::numeric_limits<int>::max()));
81 return max_pixels_wanted > max_pixels_per_frame;
82}
83
84bool CanDecreaseFrameRateTo(int max_frame_rate,
85 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions) {
86 const int fps_wanted = std::max(kMinFrameRateFps, max_frame_rate);
87 return fps_wanted <
88 rtc::dchecked_cast<int>(restrictions.max_frame_rate().value_or(
89 std::numeric_limits<int>::max()));
90}
91
92bool CanIncreaseFrameRateTo(int max_frame_rate,
93 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions) {
94 return max_frame_rate >
95 rtc::dchecked_cast<int>(restrictions.max_frame_rate().value_or(
96 std::numeric_limits<int>::max()));
97}
98
99bool MinPixelLimitReached(const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) {
100 if (input_state.single_active_stream_pixels().has_value()) {
101 return GetLowerResolutionThan(
102 input_state.single_active_stream_pixels().value()) <
103 input_state.min_pixels_per_frame();
104 }
105 return input_state.frame_size_pixels().has_value() &&
106 GetLowerResolutionThan(input_state.frame_size_pixels().value()) <
107 input_state.min_pixels_per_frame();
108}
109
110} // namespace
111
112VideoSourceRestrictionsListener::~VideoSourceRestrictionsListener() = default;
113
114VideoSourceRestrictions FilterRestrictionsByDegradationPreference(
115 VideoSourceRestrictions source_restrictions,
116 DegradationPreference degradation_preference) {
117 switch (degradation_preference) {
118 case DegradationPreference::BALANCED:
119 break;
120 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE:
121 source_restrictions.set_max_frame_rate(absl::nullopt);
122 break;
123 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION:
124 source_restrictions.set_max_pixels_per_frame(absl::nullopt);
125 source_restrictions.set_target_pixels_per_frame(absl::nullopt);
126 break;
127 case DegradationPreference::DISABLED:
128 source_restrictions.set_max_pixels_per_frame(absl::nullopt);
129 source_restrictions.set_target_pixels_per_frame(absl::nullopt);
130 source_restrictions.set_max_frame_rate(absl::nullopt);
131 }
132 return source_restrictions;
133}
134
135// For resolution, the steps we take are 3/5 (down) and 5/3 (up).
136// Notice the asymmetry of which restriction property is set depending on if
137// we are adapting up or down:
138// - VideoSourceRestrictor::DecreaseResolution() sets the max_pixels_per_frame()
139// to the desired target and target_pixels_per_frame() to null.
140// - VideoSourceRestrictor::IncreaseResolutionTo() sets the
141// target_pixels_per_frame() to the desired target, and max_pixels_per_frame()
142// is set according to VideoSourceRestrictor::GetIncreasedMaxPixelsWanted().
143int GetLowerResolutionThan(int pixel_count) {
144 RTC_DCHECK(pixel_count != std::numeric_limits<int>::max());
145 return (pixel_count * 3) / 5;
146}
147
148// TODO(hbos): Use absl::optional<> instead?
149int GetHigherResolutionThan(int pixel_count) {
150 return pixel_count != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
151 ? (pixel_count * 5) / 3
152 : std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
153}
154
155// static
156const char* Adaptation::StatusToString(Adaptation::Status status) {
157 switch (status) {
158 case Adaptation::Status::kValid:
159 return "kValid";
160 case Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached:
161 return "kLimitReached";
162 case Adaptation::Status::kAwaitingPreviousAdaptation:
163 return "kAwaitingPreviousAdaptation";
164 case Status::kInsufficientInput:
165 return "kInsufficientInput";
166 case Status::kAdaptationDisabled:
167 return "kAdaptationDisabled";
168 case Status::kRejectedByConstraint:
169 return "kRejectedByConstraint";
170 }
171 RTC_CHECK_NOTREACHED();
172}
173
174Adaptation::Adaptation(int validation_id,
175 VideoSourceRestrictions restrictions,
176 VideoAdaptationCounters counters,
177 VideoStreamInputState input_state)
178 : validation_id_(validation_id),
179 status_(Status::kValid),
180 input_state_(std::move(input_state)),
181 restrictions_(std::move(restrictions)),
182 counters_(std::move(counters)) {}
183
184Adaptation::Adaptation(int validation_id, Status invalid_status)
185 : validation_id_(validation_id), status_(invalid_status) {
186 RTC_DCHECK_NE(status_, Status::kValid);
187}
188
189Adaptation::Status Adaptation::status() const {
190 return status_;
191}
192
193const VideoStreamInputState& Adaptation::input_state() const {
194 return input_state_;
195}
196
197const VideoSourceRestrictions& Adaptation::restrictions() const {
198 return restrictions_;
199}
200
201const VideoAdaptationCounters& Adaptation::counters() const {
202 return counters_;
203}
204
205VideoStreamAdapter::VideoStreamAdapter(
206 VideoStreamInputStateProvider* input_state_provider,
207 VideoStreamEncoderObserver* encoder_stats_observer)
208 : input_state_provider_(input_state_provider),
209 encoder_stats_observer_(encoder_stats_observer),
210 adaptation_validation_id_(0),
211 degradation_preference_(DegradationPreference::DISABLED),
212 awaiting_frame_size_change_(absl::nullopt) {
213 sequence_checker_.Detach();
214 RTC_DCHECK(input_state_provider_);
215 RTC_DCHECK(encoder_stats_observer_);
216}
217
218VideoStreamAdapter::~VideoStreamAdapter() {
219 RTC_DCHECK(adaptation_constraints_.empty())
220 << "There are constaint(s) attached to a VideoStreamAdapter being "
221 "destroyed.";
222}
223
224VideoSourceRestrictions VideoStreamAdapter::source_restrictions() const {
225 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
226 return current_restrictions_.restrictions;
227}
228
229const VideoAdaptationCounters& VideoStreamAdapter::adaptation_counters() const {
230 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
231 return current_restrictions_.counters;
232}
233
234void VideoStreamAdapter::ClearRestrictions() {
235 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
236 // Invalidate any previously returned Adaptation.
237 RTC_LOG(INFO) << "Resetting restrictions";
238 ++adaptation_validation_id_;
239 current_restrictions_ = {VideoSourceRestrictions(),
240 VideoAdaptationCounters()};
241 awaiting_frame_size_change_ = absl::nullopt;
242 BroadcastVideoRestrictionsUpdate(input_state_provider_->InputState(),
243 nullptr);
244}
245
246void VideoStreamAdapter::AddRestrictionsListener(
247 VideoSourceRestrictionsListener* restrictions_listener) {
248 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
249 RTC_DCHECK(std::find(restrictions_listeners_.begin(),
250 restrictions_listeners_.end(),
251 restrictions_listener) == restrictions_listeners_.end());
252 restrictions_listeners_.push_back(restrictions_listener);
253}
254
255void VideoStreamAdapter::RemoveRestrictionsListener(
256 VideoSourceRestrictionsListener* restrictions_listener) {
257 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
258 auto it = std::find(restrictions_listeners_.begin(),
259 restrictions_listeners_.end(), restrictions_listener);
260 RTC_DCHECK(it != restrictions_listeners_.end());
261 restrictions_listeners_.erase(it);
262}
263
264void VideoStreamAdapter::AddAdaptationConstraint(
265 AdaptationConstraint* adaptation_constraint) {
266 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
267 RTC_DCHECK(std::find(adaptation_constraints_.begin(),
268 adaptation_constraints_.end(),
269 adaptation_constraint) == adaptation_constraints_.end());
270 adaptation_constraints_.push_back(adaptation_constraint);
271}
272
273void VideoStreamAdapter::RemoveAdaptationConstraint(
274 AdaptationConstraint* adaptation_constraint) {
275 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
276 auto it = std::find(adaptation_constraints_.begin(),
277 adaptation_constraints_.end(), adaptation_constraint);
278 RTC_DCHECK(it != adaptation_constraints_.end());
279 adaptation_constraints_.erase(it);
280}
281
282void VideoStreamAdapter::SetDegradationPreference(
283 DegradationPreference degradation_preference) {
284 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
285 if (degradation_preference_ == degradation_preference)
286 return;
287 // Invalidate any previously returned Adaptation.
288 ++adaptation_validation_id_;
289 bool balanced_switch =
290 degradation_preference == DegradationPreference::BALANCED ||
291 degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::BALANCED;
292 degradation_preference_ = degradation_preference;
293 if (balanced_switch) {
294 // ClearRestrictions() calls BroadcastVideoRestrictionsUpdate(nullptr).
295 ClearRestrictions();
296 } else {
297 BroadcastVideoRestrictionsUpdate(input_state_provider_->InputState(),
298 nullptr);
299 }
300}
301
302struct VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrStateVisitor {
303 Adaptation operator()(const RestrictionsWithCounters& r) const {
304 return Adaptation(adaptation_validation_id, r.restrictions, r.counters,
305 input_state);
306 }
307 Adaptation operator()(const Adaptation::Status& status) const {
308 RTC_DCHECK_NE(status, Adaptation::Status::kValid);
309 return Adaptation(adaptation_validation_id, status);
310 }
311
312 const int adaptation_validation_id;
313 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state;
314};
315
316Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(
317 VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState step_or_state,
318 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) const {
319 RTC_DCHECK(!step_or_state.valueless_by_exception());
320 return absl::visit(
321 RestrictionsOrStateVisitor{adaptation_validation_id_, input_state},
322 step_or_state);
323}
324
325Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationUp(
326 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) const {
327 RestrictionsOrState step = GetAdaptationUpStep(input_state);
328 // If an adaptation proposed, check with the constraints that it is ok.
329 if (absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(step)) {
330 RestrictionsWithCounters restrictions =
331 absl::get<RestrictionsWithCounters>(step);
332 for (const auto* constraint : adaptation_constraints_) {
333 if (!constraint->IsAdaptationUpAllowed(input_state,
334 current_restrictions_.restrictions,
335 restrictions.restrictions)) {
336 RTC_LOG(INFO) << "Not adapting up because constraint \""
337 << constraint->Name() << "\" disallowed it";
338 step = Adaptation::Status::kRejectedByConstraint;
339 }
340 }
341 }
342 return RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(step, input_state);
343}
344
345Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationUp() {
346 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
347 VideoStreamInputState input_state = input_state_provider_->InputState();
348 ++adaptation_validation_id_;
349 Adaptation adaptation = GetAdaptationUp(input_state);
350 return adaptation;
351}
352
353VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationUpStep(
354 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) const {
355 if (!HasSufficientInputForAdaptation(input_state)) {
356 return Adaptation::Status::kInsufficientInput;
357 }
358 // Don't adapt if we're awaiting a previous adaptation to have an effect.
359 if (awaiting_frame_size_change_ &&
360 awaiting_frame_size_change_->pixels_increased &&
361 degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE &&
362 input_state.frame_size_pixels().value() <=
363 awaiting_frame_size_change_->frame_size_pixels) {
364 return Adaptation::Status::kAwaitingPreviousAdaptation;
365 }
366
367 // Maybe propose targets based on degradation preference.
368 switch (degradation_preference_) {
369 case DegradationPreference::BALANCED: {
370 // Attempt to increase target frame rate.
371 RestrictionsOrState increase_frame_rate =
372 IncreaseFramerate(input_state, current_restrictions_);
373 if (absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(
374 increase_frame_rate)) {
375 return increase_frame_rate;
376 }
377 // else, increase resolution.
378 ABSL_FALLTHROUGH_INTENDED;
379 }
380 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE: {
381 // Attempt to increase pixel count.
382 return IncreaseResolution(input_state, current_restrictions_);
383 }
384 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION: {
385 // Scale up framerate.
386 return IncreaseFramerate(input_state, current_restrictions_);
387 }
388 case DegradationPreference::DISABLED:
389 return Adaptation::Status::kAdaptationDisabled;
390 }
391 RTC_CHECK_NOTREACHED();
392}
393
394Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationDown() {
395 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
396 VideoStreamInputState input_state = input_state_provider_->InputState();
397 ++adaptation_validation_id_;
398 RestrictionsOrState restrictions_or_state =
399 GetAdaptationDownStep(input_state, current_restrictions_);
400 if (MinPixelLimitReached(input_state)) {
401 encoder_stats_observer_->OnMinPixelLimitReached();
402 }
403 // Check for min_fps
404 if (degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::BALANCED &&
405 absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(
406 restrictions_or_state)) {
407 restrictions_or_state = AdaptIfFpsDiffInsufficient(
408 input_state,
409 absl::get<RestrictionsWithCounters>(restrictions_or_state));
410 }
411 return RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(restrictions_or_state, input_state);
412}
413
414VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState
415VideoStreamAdapter::AdaptIfFpsDiffInsufficient(
416 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
417 const RestrictionsWithCounters& restrictions) const {
418 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(degradation_preference_, DegradationPreference::BALANCED);
419 absl::optional<int> min_fps_diff =
420 balanced_settings_.MinFpsDiff(input_state.frame_size_pixels().value());
421 if (current_restrictions_.counters.fps_adaptations <
422 restrictions.counters.fps_adaptations &&
423 min_fps_diff && input_state.frames_per_second() > 0) {
424 int fps_diff = input_state.frames_per_second() -
425 restrictions.restrictions.max_frame_rate().value();
426 if (fps_diff < min_fps_diff.value()) {
427 return GetAdaptationDownStep(input_state, restrictions);
428 }
429 }
430 return restrictions;
431}
432
433VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState
434VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationDownStep(
435 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
436 const RestrictionsWithCounters& current_restrictions) const {
437 if (!HasSufficientInputForAdaptation(input_state)) {
438 return Adaptation::Status::kInsufficientInput;
439 }
440 // Don't adapt if we're awaiting a previous adaptation to have an effect or
441 // if we switched degradation preference.
442 if (awaiting_frame_size_change_ &&
443 !awaiting_frame_size_change_->pixels_increased &&
444 degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE &&
445 input_state.frame_size_pixels().value() >=
446 awaiting_frame_size_change_->frame_size_pixels) {
447 return Adaptation::Status::kAwaitingPreviousAdaptation;
448 }
449 // Maybe propose targets based on degradation preference.
450 switch (degradation_preference_) {
451 case DegradationPreference::BALANCED: {
452 // Try scale down framerate, if lower.
453 RestrictionsOrState decrease_frame_rate =
454 DecreaseFramerate(input_state, current_restrictions);
455 if (absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(
456 decrease_frame_rate)) {
457 return decrease_frame_rate;
458 }
459 // else, decrease resolution.
460 ABSL_FALLTHROUGH_INTENDED;
461 }
462 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE: {
463 return DecreaseResolution(input_state, current_restrictions);
464 }
465 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION: {
466 return DecreaseFramerate(input_state, current_restrictions);
467 }
468 case DegradationPreference::DISABLED:
469 return Adaptation::Status::kAdaptationDisabled;
470 }
471 RTC_CHECK_NOTREACHED();
472}
473
474VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState VideoStreamAdapter::DecreaseResolution(
475 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
476 const RestrictionsWithCounters& current_restrictions) {
477 int target_pixels =
478 GetLowerResolutionThan(input_state.frame_size_pixels().value());
479 // Use single active stream if set, this stream could be lower than the input.
480 int target_pixels_min =
481 GetLowerResolutionThan(input_state.single_active_stream_pixels().value_or(
482 input_state.frame_size_pixels().value()));
483 if (!CanDecreaseResolutionTo(target_pixels, target_pixels_min, input_state,
484 current_restrictions.restrictions)) {
485 return Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached;
486 }
487 RestrictionsWithCounters new_restrictions = current_restrictions;
488 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Scaling down resolution, max pixels: " << target_pixels;
489 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_max_pixels_per_frame(
490 target_pixels != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
491 ? absl::optional<size_t>(target_pixels)
492 : absl::nullopt);
493 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_target_pixels_per_frame(absl::nullopt);
494 ++new_restrictions.counters.resolution_adaptations;
495 return new_restrictions;
496}
497
498VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState VideoStreamAdapter::DecreaseFramerate(
499 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
500 const RestrictionsWithCounters& current_restrictions) const {
501 int max_frame_rate;
502 if (degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION) {
503 max_frame_rate = GetLowerFrameRateThan(input_state.frames_per_second());
504 } else if (degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::BALANCED) {
505 max_frame_rate =
506 balanced_settings_.MinFps(input_state.video_codec_type(),
507 input_state.frame_size_pixels().value());
508 } else {
509 RTC_NOTREACHED();
510 max_frame_rate = GetLowerFrameRateThan(input_state.frames_per_second());
511 }
512 if (!CanDecreaseFrameRateTo(max_frame_rate,
513 current_restrictions.restrictions)) {
514 return Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached;
515 }
516 RestrictionsWithCounters new_restrictions = current_restrictions;
517 max_frame_rate = std::max(kMinFrameRateFps, max_frame_rate);
518 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Scaling down framerate: " << max_frame_rate;
519 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_max_frame_rate(
520 max_frame_rate != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
521 ? absl::optional<double>(max_frame_rate)
522 : absl::nullopt);
523 ++new_restrictions.counters.fps_adaptations;
524 return new_restrictions;
525}
526
527VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState VideoStreamAdapter::IncreaseResolution(
528 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
529 const RestrictionsWithCounters& current_restrictions) {
530 int target_pixels = input_state.frame_size_pixels().value();
531 if (current_restrictions.counters.resolution_adaptations == 1) {
532 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Removing resolution down-scaling setting.";
533 target_pixels = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
534 }
535 target_pixels = GetHigherResolutionThan(target_pixels);
536 if (!CanIncreaseResolutionTo(target_pixels,
537 current_restrictions.restrictions)) {
538 return Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached;
539 }
540 int max_pixels_wanted = GetIncreasedMaxPixelsWanted(target_pixels);
541 RestrictionsWithCounters new_restrictions = current_restrictions;
542 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Scaling up resolution, max pixels: "
543 << max_pixels_wanted;
544 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_max_pixels_per_frame(
545 max_pixels_wanted != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
546 ? absl::optional<size_t>(max_pixels_wanted)
547 : absl::nullopt);
548 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_target_pixels_per_frame(
549 max_pixels_wanted != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
550 ? absl::optional<size_t>(target_pixels)
551 : absl::nullopt);
552 --new_restrictions.counters.resolution_adaptations;
553 RTC_DCHECK_GE(new_restrictions.counters.resolution_adaptations, 0);
554 return new_restrictions;
555}
556
557VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState VideoStreamAdapter::IncreaseFramerate(
558 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
559 const RestrictionsWithCounters& current_restrictions) const {
560 int max_frame_rate;
561 if (degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION) {
562 max_frame_rate = GetHigherFrameRateThan(input_state.frames_per_second());
563 } else if (degradation_preference_ == DegradationPreference::BALANCED) {
564 max_frame_rate =
565 balanced_settings_.MaxFps(input_state.video_codec_type(),
566 input_state.frame_size_pixels().value());
567 // In BALANCED, the max_frame_rate must be checked before proceeding. This
568 // is because the MaxFps might be the current Fps and so the balanced
569 // settings may want to scale up the resolution.=
570 if (!CanIncreaseFrameRateTo(max_frame_rate,
571 current_restrictions.restrictions)) {
572 return Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached;
573 }
574 } else {
575 RTC_NOTREACHED();
576 max_frame_rate = GetHigherFrameRateThan(input_state.frames_per_second());
577 }
578 if (current_restrictions.counters.fps_adaptations == 1) {
579 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Removing framerate down-scaling setting.";
580 max_frame_rate = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
581 }
582 if (!CanIncreaseFrameRateTo(max_frame_rate,
583 current_restrictions.restrictions)) {
584 return Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached;
585 }
586 RTC_LOG(LS_INFO) << "Scaling up framerate: " << max_frame_rate;
587 RestrictionsWithCounters new_restrictions = current_restrictions;
588 new_restrictions.restrictions.set_max_frame_rate(
589 max_frame_rate != std::numeric_limits<int>::max()
590 ? absl::optional<double>(max_frame_rate)
591 : absl::nullopt);
592 --new_restrictions.counters.fps_adaptations;
593 RTC_DCHECK_GE(new_restrictions.counters.fps_adaptations, 0);
594 return new_restrictions;
595}
596
597Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptDownResolution() {
598 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
599 VideoStreamInputState input_state = input_state_provider_->InputState();
600 switch (degradation_preference_) {
601 case DegradationPreference::DISABLED:
602 return RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(
603 Adaptation::Status::kAdaptationDisabled, input_state);
604 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION:
605 return RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(Adaptation::Status::kLimitReached,
606 input_state);
607 case DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_FRAMERATE:
608 return GetAdaptationDown();
609 case DegradationPreference::BALANCED: {
610 return RestrictionsOrStateToAdaptation(
611 GetAdaptDownResolutionStepForBalanced(input_state), input_state);
612 }
613 }
614 RTC_CHECK_NOTREACHED();
615}
616
617VideoStreamAdapter::RestrictionsOrState
618VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptDownResolutionStepForBalanced(
619 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) const {
620 // Adapt twice if the first adaptation did not decrease resolution.
621 auto first_step = GetAdaptationDownStep(input_state, current_restrictions_);
622 if (!absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(first_step)) {
623 return first_step;
624 }
625 auto first_restrictions = absl::get<RestrictionsWithCounters>(first_step);
626 if (first_restrictions.counters.resolution_adaptations >
627 current_restrictions_.counters.resolution_adaptations) {
628 return first_step;
629 }
630 // We didn't decrease resolution so force it; amend a resolution resuction
631 // to the existing framerate reduction in |first_restrictions|.
632 auto second_step = DecreaseResolution(input_state, first_restrictions);
633 if (absl::holds_alternative<RestrictionsWithCounters>(second_step)) {
634 return second_step;
635 }
636 // If the second step was not successful then settle for the first one.
637 return first_step;
638}
639
640void VideoStreamAdapter::ApplyAdaptation(
641 const Adaptation& adaptation,
642 rtc::scoped_refptr<Resource> resource) {
643 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
644 RTC_DCHECK_EQ(adaptation.validation_id_, adaptation_validation_id_);
645 if (adaptation.status() != Adaptation::Status::kValid)
646 return;
647 // Remember the input pixels and fps of this adaptation. Used to avoid
648 // adapting again before this adaptation has had an effect.
649 if (DidIncreaseResolution(current_restrictions_.restrictions,
650 adaptation.restrictions())) {
651 awaiting_frame_size_change_.emplace(
652 true, adaptation.input_state().frame_size_pixels().value());
653 } else if (DidDecreaseResolution(current_restrictions_.restrictions,
654 adaptation.restrictions())) {
655 awaiting_frame_size_change_.emplace(
656 false, adaptation.input_state().frame_size_pixels().value());
657 } else {
658 awaiting_frame_size_change_ = absl::nullopt;
659 }
660 current_restrictions_ = {adaptation.restrictions(), adaptation.counters()};
661 BroadcastVideoRestrictionsUpdate(adaptation.input_state(), resource);
662}
663
664Adaptation VideoStreamAdapter::GetAdaptationTo(
665 const VideoAdaptationCounters& counters,
666 const VideoSourceRestrictions& restrictions) {
667 // Adapts up/down from the current levels so counters are equal.
668 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
669 VideoStreamInputState input_state = input_state_provider_->InputState();
670 return Adaptation(adaptation_validation_id_, restrictions, counters,
671 input_state);
672}
673
674void VideoStreamAdapter::BroadcastVideoRestrictionsUpdate(
675 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state,
676 const rtc::scoped_refptr<Resource>& resource) {
677 RTC_DCHECK_RUN_ON(&sequence_checker_);
678 VideoSourceRestrictions filtered = FilterRestrictionsByDegradationPreference(
679 source_restrictions(), degradation_preference_);
680 if (last_filtered_restrictions_ == filtered) {
681 return;
682 }
683 for (auto* restrictions_listener : restrictions_listeners_) {
684 restrictions_listener->OnVideoSourceRestrictionsUpdated(
685 filtered, current_restrictions_.counters, resource,
686 source_restrictions());
687 }
688 last_video_source_restrictions_ = current_restrictions_.restrictions;
689 last_filtered_restrictions_ = filtered;
690}
691
692bool VideoStreamAdapter::HasSufficientInputForAdaptation(
693 const VideoStreamInputState& input_state) const {
694 return input_state.HasInputFrameSizeAndFramesPerSecond() &&
695 (degradation_preference_ !=
696 DegradationPreference::MAINTAIN_RESOLUTION ||
697 input_state.frames_per_second() >= kMinFrameRateFps);
698}
699
700VideoStreamAdapter::AwaitingFrameSizeChange::AwaitingFrameSizeChange(
701 bool pixels_increased,
702 int frame_size_pixels)
703 : pixels_increased(pixels_increased),
704 frame_size_pixels(frame_size_pixels) {}
705
706absl::optional<uint32_t> VideoStreamAdapter::GetSingleActiveLayerPixels(
707 const VideoCodec& codec) {
708 int num_active = 0;
709 absl::optional<uint32_t> pixels;
710 if (codec.codecType == VideoCodecType::kVideoCodecVP9) {
711 for (int i = 0; i < codec.VP9().numberOfSpatialLayers; ++i) {
712 if (codec.spatialLayers[i].active) {
713 ++num_active;
714 pixels = codec.spatialLayers[i].width * codec.spatialLayers[i].height;
715 }
716 }
717 } else {
718 for (int i = 0; i < codec.numberOfSimulcastStreams; ++i) {
719 if (codec.simulcastStream[i].active) {
720 ++num_active;
721 pixels =
722 codec.simulcastStream[i].width * codec.simulcastStream[i].height;
723 }
724 }
725 }
726 return (num_active > 1) ? absl::nullopt : pixels;
727}
